text: The English Clubs Knockout Cup or The National Colts Cup is a Nationwide competition for English Rugby union Clubs Colts (under age 19) teams. The competition is a straight knock-out competition that is organised by the East Midlands Rugby Union. The prestigious competition has always had a wide range of grassroots clubs up to Premiership academy teams competing for the top prize. The Competition is firstly set on a Regional level, with the four national districts being split into 8 Regions. From each region there will be 4 qualifiers to go onto the National Stages of the Cup competition. A plate competition was introduced to run alongside the main Cup competition for all sides knocked out in the Regional stages. In 2009/10 the Cup Competition is celebrating its thirteenth year of existence. ==Latest update 2014/15 == Final played 4 May 2015 at Bedford RFU Tonbridge Juddians 43 Wolverhampton 17 Plate Final Havant v Wharfedale Wharfedale won narrowly Hornets 12 Bedford Blues 55 ==2007/2008 Competition== === Cup Competition=== ====Final: 5 May 2008 (Bank Holiday Monday)==== {| class="wikitable" |- style="font-size:140%;" | width="25%" align="center" | Home | width="10%" align="center" | | width="7%" align="center" | | width="10%" align="center" | | width="25%" align="center" | Away |----- | width="25%" | Bedford Blues || width="10%" align="center" | 33 | width="7%" align="center" | v | width="10%" align="center" | 16 || width="25%" | Nuneaton |} ===Plate Competition=== ====Final: 5 May 2008 (Bank Holiday Monday)==== {| class="wikitable" |- style="font-size:140%;" | width="25%" align="center" | Home | width="10%" align="center" | | width="7%" align="center" | | width="10%" align="center" | | width="25%" align="center" | Away |----- | width="25%" | Bishops Stortford || width="10%" align="center" | 16 | width="7%" align="center" | v | width="10%" align="center" | 46 || width="25%" | Newbury |} ==Previous season's roundup== 2007/2008 = 2007 -
